name: The Backroom - Lost and Found
description:
The Backroom - Lost and Found is a story of a room in the backrooms. You find yourself in the deep end of a strange maze like office and you must find a way out. The escape will go through different realms, floors, and you will meet some of the strange inhabitants of this flexnugglian space.

Can you keep your sanity, bring the lost together, and find your way out?

FEATURES

  • Coherent story with a clear start and end.
  • Secrets, strangeness, and all around mysteriousness.
  • Lots of Collectibles and Achievements.
  • Playtime approx 60 minutes.
  • Aims for a loving oppressing and uneasy atmosphere.
  • Contains one (1) jump-scare.
  • Has a bit trypophobic content.
  • No clipping.

TECHNICAL INFO

There is no way to save your progress.
There are no proper menus or real settings.
This is just the game, without anything else.
